conversation.message_text: Luminox Watches: This join request is invalid. Please try to join again. For help, email support@attentivemobile.com
Luminox Watches: Welcome to Luminox Watches! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Luminox Watches: Hi there, this is Taylor. How can I help you?

Hello Taylor,
   I own an XS 3500 series, the luminescent on my bezel is not working, is this covered under the luminox warranty.  This watch was purchased at an authorized luminox jewelry store.

Luminox Watches: Hello, thank you for reaching out!

Any malfunction in materials or workmanship during the warranty period of your watch will be repaired free of charge, as long as you present your warranty certificate along with the timepiece. Please note that damage from inappropriate use, the battery, crystal, and normal wear to the case, strap, or bracelet are not covered.

Based on what you described with the luminescent bezel, this should generally fall under the warranty if it's a manufacturing issue. You can review our full warranty policy here: https://luminox.attn.tv/aH8vHispNUcx

If you'd like, I can guide you on how to start a warranty repair request.

promo_and_exclusions: Discounts or promotional codes can't be combined with the already discounted products in the Sale category, unless differently specified on the website
